summary: Ultra-luxury corporate landing page for ZINMATT GLOBAL - premium digital marketing agency with black & gold design, featuring services: Performance Marketing, Social Media Ads, Google Ads, High-Converting Funnels, Graphic Design & Branding, International Business Growth Strategy
architectural_notes: Typography: Elegant bold serif headings, minimal modern sans-serif body, large spacing
Luxury effects: Soft gold glow buttons, glassmorphism sections, lighting effects
Animation system: Fade-in, slow zoom backgrounds, Apple keynote-style slide transitions per section
Design philosophy: Minimal clutter, authoritative tone, visual impact over text density
Slide-based layout: 6 distinct premium presentation slides with smooth transitions between sections
Color palette: Pure black (#000000), deep charcoal (#0F0F0F), metallic gold gradient (#D4AF37 to #FFD700)
Animated background graphics: moving abstract lines, luxury geometric shapes, soft particles
Glassmorphism effects with subtle golden glow highlights throughout
Smooth scroll animations and slide transitions for every section
Modern luxury typography: bold sans-serif headings, clean light body font
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Luxury abstract geometric pattern background with gold lines and shapes on black background (luxury-geometric-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Animated particle effect overlay with soft golden particles on transparent background (gold-particles-overlay.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Moving abstract lines pattern with luxury gold gradients for background animation (abstract-gold-lines.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create cinematic hero section with headline 'Redefining Global Logistics & Business Expansion', subheadline 'Precision. Power. Prestige.', two CTA buttons ('Schedule Private Consultation' and 'Call Now') with luxury gold glowing effects, and animated world trade routes or dark cinematic transport background with slow zoom motion

Create About section with brand positioning statement: 'ROOT X GLOBAL is an elite global solutions partner delivering high-performance logistics, strategic expansion, and market dominance.' with authoritative and exclusive tone

Create Signature Services section with headline and 6 service cards in luxury layout: 'Global Freight & Transport Management', 'Import-Export Strategy', 'Corporate Branding & Website Solutions', 'High-End Digital Advertising', 'Market Expansion Consulting', 'Executive Sales Structuring'. Each card must have gold outline, hover glow animation, and appear with slide transition

Create 'The Difference' section with headline 'Why Industry Leaders Choose ROOT X GLOBAL' and 5 bullet points: 'Global Network Advantage', 'Strategic Intelligence', 'Precision Execution', 'Premium Client Support', 'Performance Driven Results' with minimal text and strong visual impact
Create power statement section on full black background with large gold typography displaying: 'Beyond Transportation. Beyond Marketing. We Build Global Empires.'

Create exclusive contact section with headline 'Begin Your Global Expansion Journey', display phone number 7557831531 and email www.rootxglobal@gmail.com in luxury gold bordered contact box, and glowing CTA button 'Book Executive Consultation'
Create footer with company name 'ROOT X GLOBAL' and tagline 'Expanding Beyond Boundaries' using premium black and gold styling

Implement ultra-premium black and gold design system with primary color deep matte black (#0A0A0A), metallic gold gradient accents, subtle royal navy blue secondary accents, luxury lighting effects, soft gold glow on interactive elements, and glassmorphism sections throughout the page
Implement typography system with elegant bold serif headings and minimal modern sans-serif body text, ensuring large spacing and clean luxury layout throughout the page

Implement premium animation system with smooth fade-in effects, slow zoom background motion on hero section, and Apple keynote-style slide transitions between sections where each section appears like a premium presentation slide
Ensure entire landing page is fully mobile responsive while maintaining luxury visual impact, premium spacing, and high-end design integrity across all device sizes

Generate cinematic transport visuals including cargo ship at night with gold light reflections, premium container terminals, private jet cargo, and global trade routes animation elements to support the luxury transport and logistics theme

Update hero section headline to 'Global Growth. Strategic Power. Market Domination.' and subheadline to 'ROOT X GLOBAL Delivers Elite Marketing & Business Expansion Solutions.' Replace existing CTA button text with 'Schedule Executive Consultation' and 'Start Your Growth Journey'

Create new 'The Problem' slide section that displays 4 business pain points in bold luxury format: 'No consistent leads', 'Weak online presence', 'Poor branding visibility', 'No structured sales system'. Use minimal text with strong visual impact, gold accent markers, and glassmorphism card styling

Update services section title to 'Our Elite Solutions' and replace the 6 existing service cards with new services: 'Premium Website Development', 'High-Converting Social Media Ads', 'Cinematic Video Advertising', 'SEO & Brand Authority Building', 'Business Development Strategy', 'Sales Team & Insurance Advisory Structuring'. Maintain animated gold-outline cards with one-by-one appearance and soft gold glow effect

Update 'The Difference' section headline to 'Why Global Brands Trust Us' and replace existing bullet points with: 'Data-Driven Growth Strategy', 'Performance-Focused Execution', 'Premium Client Support', 'Local & Global Market Expertise', 'Result-Oriented Approach'. Maintain spacious and powerful layout

Update power statement section typography to display three separate lines: 'We Don't Just Build Businesses.', 'We Build Global Brands.' Add subtle animated gold light streak effect that moves across the screen horizontally

Update contact section headline to 'Let's Build Your Global Success Story' and change CTA button text to 'Book Private Strategy Call'. Maintain phone number 7557831531 and email www.rootxglobal@gmail.com in luxury gold bordered contact box with glowing effects

Update about section brand positioning statement to: 'ROOT X GLOBAL is an elite global growth and expansion partner delivering premium marketing, business development, and strategic sales solutions.' Adjust tone to reflect expanded service portfolio beyond logistics
Update primary matte black color from #0A0A0A to #0B0B0B throughout the design system to match the specified color code

Implement slide-style section transitions where each major section appears like a premium presentation slide with smooth entrance effects, ensuring each section feels like a distinct slide in a keynote presentation
Update all branding from 'ROOT X GLOBAL' to 'ZINMATT GLOBAL' throughout the application including page title, meta tags, headings, and footer
Update company tagline to 'Elevating Brands to Global Authority' in footer and meta description
Update hero section headline to 'We Build Global Digital Authority' and subheadline to 'Premium Digital Marketing, Social Media Ads & Business Development Solutions.'
Update hero section CTA buttons to 'Get Free Consultation' and 'View Our Services'

Update about section to introduce ZINMATT GLOBAL as a performance-driven digital growth agency with focus areas: Digital Marketing, Social Media Advertising, Business Development, Lead Generation, Branding Strategy

Replace services section with 6 new services: 'Performance Marketing', 'Facebook & Instagram Ads', 'Google Ads Management', 'High-Converting Funnels', 'Graphic Design & Branding', 'International Business Growth Strategy' with appropriate icons

Update 'Why Choose Us' section to display 4 points: 'ROI Focused Strategy', 'Data Driven Execution', 'Premium Brand Positioning', 'International Market Expertise' with check marks and glowing golden borders
Remove the Problem section from the landing page as it is not part of ZINMATT GLOBAL's structure
Create portfolio section with sliding gallery layout and luxury hover effects
Update CTA section with gold gradient background, 'Ready To Scale Globally?' text, and 'Book Strategy Call' button
Update contact section headline to display phone 7557831531, email, and add WhatsApp button with gold highlight on minimal black background
Update power statement section to reflect ZINMATT GLOBAL's brand message while maintaining animated gold light streaks and full-screen black background
Add animated background graphics including moving abstract lines, luxury geometric shapes, and soft particles to enhance the ultra-premium feel throughout the page
Update color system to use exact palette: #000000 (black), #0f0f0f (charcoal), and metallic gold gradient (#D4AF37 to #FFD700) replacing previous #0B0B0B base
Add social media icons in gold color to footer (Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram)
Render generated luxury background images including abstract geometric patterns and particle effects as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with full-screen black background, gold animated graphics, headline 'We Build Global Digital Authority', subheadline about premium digital marketing solutions, dual CTAs: 'Get Free Consultation' and 'View Our Services' with motion animation

Why Choose Us section with black background, glowing golden borders, 4 points: ROI Focused Strategy, Data Driven Execution, Premium Brand Positioning, International Market Expertise
Portfolio section with sliding gallery layout and luxury hover effects
CTA section with gold gradient background, 'Ready To Scale Globally?' text, 'Book Strategy Call' button
Contact section with minimal black background, phone 7557831531, email, WhatsApp button with gold highlight
